Articles.Content:
Here's a craft based on the Origin Jumpworks 300i from Star Citizen.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Craft file: http://www./view/r6zks1xu4kqz376/300i.craft

It's a bit tricky to fly but it could at least reach orbit for a short time. I placed canard parts for flight stability. I also wish the wings were a bit shorter... hard to stay close to the design when you can't find the right stock part.

If you liked that, take a look at my version of the F7A Hornet: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/66618-Star-Citizen-F7A-Hornet

Edited January 22, 2014 by pheeph
Are there some more small crafts from SC kerbalified?

Are there some more small crafts from SC kerbalified?

Well, I don't have anything else other than the F7A Hornet... However, I may try to design the Avenger and the M50... I also was considering designing the Vanduul Scythe, but decided not to... I found that out the hard way when I designed some asymmetrical craft from Wing Commander...
